changes.name: Better clan page with tabs, for less scrolling
Brush logo instead of money bag icon in the footer
Added link to PS pool in the menu
More reliable fetching of journal events. No more duplicates.
Added background panel to player/clan name in the shop
Added link to PS estfor items in the shop
Increased decimals in paintswap to support smaller listing values
Fixed crash when entered decimal values in certain fields
Resetting approve brush botton state after switching player
Added born hero player name in wallet journal
Exact name matching when checking for available names
Now remembers the refill boost when changing page or player
Can now close both toast messages when two are shown
Fixed inactive buttons properly in inventory
Correct URL when clicking empty quest icon
